pages.text: To increase your vitality, you must perform specific rites with rare catalysts:$(br2)$(l)Crimson Heart:$(br)Hold a $(6)Nether Star$() and $(6)Sneak-Right-Click$().
$(l)Sanguine Heart:$(br)Wield a $(6)Dragon Claw$() and $(6)Sneak-Right-Click$() on a peaceful animal. The creature's life force will crystallize into a heart.
$(l)Heart of Ascension:$(br)This requires the power of the storm. $(6)Sneak-Right-Click$() with a $(4)Bleeding Dragon's Eye$() specifically while $(b)Thunder$() rages in the skies.
